lyrics:
7 contributorsbaggage lyricsverse 1
i know i do some things that make you so confused
one minute im so in love and the next i cant stand you
but if you may ask its just some things that you do
that reminds me of all of the mess that ive been through

chorus
all of this baggage with me
dont wanna make you pay for what
somebody else has done to me
i dont know what to do
with all this baggage in me
every time i hurt your feelings
every time i hurt your feelings
its what someones done to me
didnt mean to hurt you babe
i don’t mean to hurt you

verse 2
heartache and pain i just cant do it again
so i look for the worst and brace myself for the hurt
but nobody has ever treated me this way
please be patient with me cause i want you to stay
but i got baggage

chorus
all of this baggage with me
dont wanna make you pay for what
somebody else has done to me
i dont know what to do

with all this baggage in me
every time i hurt your feelings

you might also likebridge
this is no way to be livin my life its no way for me to live
but i can’t get it out of my mind cant get it out of my mind
you know i love you yes i do you know i love you baby
so dont go and get it twisted

verse 3
dont be confused cause boy you know i really do love you oh
i want you to stay with me i never meant to hurt you baby oh
it wont be easy getting rid of all this baggage see
all this baggage yeah
